reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major leukemia subtypes: acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL ~2), acute myeloid leukemia (AML ~4), chronic lymphocytic leukemia (CLL ~2), chronic myeloid leukemia (CML ~1), and other leukemias (~4) = approximately 13 per 100k globally.
